nodes.text: Star Wars Reunion II was held at Le Grand Rex, the famous theatre of Paris, October 27 through October 28, 2007, almost thirty years after the first French release of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
On May 3, 2007, StarWars.com posted an official announcement regarding Star Wars Reunion II.
The six films of Star Wars where screened in a two-day marathon, all in French.
